Comments
========

For the categories "Projects", "Contracts" and "Employee" itÂ´s possible to save
comments. Comments are build out of a free text and the possibility, to add
some files. Comments are generally just assigned to a object and save the
author and the publishing date automatically.

Comments own a simple formula, which contains a field for free text and a
dialogue to umpload some files. Comments always appear in the detail view from
the object, where they was crated for.
